results.content: You make quite a few mistakes along the way, you don't pay attention to W3C valid writing and your CSS is too detailed. Why not use simple bootstrap and focus on the JS? Styling is overkill, you took 4 lessons to style the uploader. As for the rest good vid. I hoped for some more vanilla JS though.

response.content: in this course i clearly mentioned i'll going to use a core things, so that's why i styled everything by myself rather than using any framework, so students can learn how they can style things, you should read the course description before you enrolled, so you do not get confuse and give bad rating :)
